purpose: Pre-test and post-test personality assessment for Alice Chen
reference: John, O. P., Donahue, E. M., & Kentle, R. L. (1991). The Big Five Inventory

response_scale.3: 既不同意也不反对 (Neither Agree nor Disagree)

instructions.en: Please indicate how much you agree or disagree with each statement by selecting a number from 1 to 5.
instructions.zh: 请根据以下陈述对你的符合程度,选择1-5的数字表示你的同意程度。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who is talkative.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个健谈的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who tends to find fault with others.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个倾向于挑剔他人的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who does a thorough job.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个把工作做得彻底的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who is depressed, blue.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个容易感到沮丧、忧郁的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who is original, comes up with new ideas.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个有独创性、能想出新点子的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who is reserved.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个话不多、矜持的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who is helpful and unselfish with others.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个乐于助人、无私的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who can be somewhat careless.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个有时会粗心大意的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who is relaxed, handles stress well.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个放松的、能很好应对压力的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who is curious about many different things.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个对很多不同事物都充满好奇的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who is full of energy.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个充满活力的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who starts quarrels with others.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个容易与他人争吵的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who is a reliable worker.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个可靠的工作者。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who can be tense.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个容易紧张的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who is ingenious, a deep thinker.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个善于思考、有创造力的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who generates a lot of enthusiasm.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个能产生很多热情的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who has a forgiving nature.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个宽容的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who tends to be disorganized.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个倾向于杂乱无章的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who worries a lot.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个经常担心的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who has an active imagination.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个有丰富想象力的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who tends to be quiet.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个倾向于安静的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who is generally trusting.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个通常信任他人的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who tends to be lazy.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个倾向于懒惰的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who is emotionally stable, not easily upset.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个情绪稳定、不容易心烦的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who is inventive.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个有创造力的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who has an assertive personality.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个果断自信的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who can be cold and aloof.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个可能冷漠疏远的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who perseveres until the task is finished.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个坚持到任务完成的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who can be moody.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个情绪多变的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who values artistic, aesthetic experiences.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个重视艺术和审美体验的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who is sometimes shy, inhibited.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个有时会害羞、拘谨的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who is considerate and kind to almost everyone.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个对几乎所有人都体贴友善的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who does things efficiently.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个做事高效的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who remains calm in tense situations.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个在紧张情况下保持冷静的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who prefers work that is routine.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个偏好常规工作的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who is outgoing, sociable.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个外向、善于社交的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who is sometimes rude to others.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个有时对他人无礼的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who makes plans and follows through with them.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个制定计划并执行的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who gets nervous easily.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个容易紧张的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who likes to reflect, play with ideas.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个喜欢思考、玩味想法的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who has few artistic interests.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个艺术兴趣较少的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who likes to cooperate with others.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个喜欢与他人合作的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who is easily distracted.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个容易分心的人。

questions.en: I see myself as someone who is sophisticated in art, music, or literature.
questions.zh: 我认为自己是一个在艺术、音乐或文学方面有修养的人。

scoring_instructions.归一化方法: 各维度得分 = (维度总分 - 维度题数×1) / (维度题数×4)
scoring_instructions.期望范围: 归一化后每个维度得分在0-1之间

validation_criteria.一致性: 同维度题目得分应有一定相关性
validation_criteria.通过标准: Pearson相关系数 r > 0.75 (预设 vs 实测)
